channel.title: How can i add a model to my server?
channel.description:
so i have all ints , i've added them to class8.java
added the model to models folder
and when i try to pickup the item it says its wrong item id.... =// any help with this one guys?

item.title: How can i add a model to my server?
item.dc:creator: @starting_coder starting coder
item.description:
@starting_coder wrote:

Go to your Source folder,
In your Item.java
If you are trying to add a Bandos Cape with ID = 11157
then…
Type ctrl+f [ type in: public static int capes
Then youll see a bunch of numbers after that.
Find the last one and add 11157, On mine it would look like this…

7650, 7657, 7672, 7674, 7676, 7678, 7680, 7682, 7685, 11157 };

Try doing that.
Save>Compile>Run.

Read full topic

item.title: How can i add a model to my server?
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

ok , so i’m trying to add bandos cape.

Here are the int’s:

if(i == 11157)
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[4];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[4];
class8.anIntArray156[0] = 57280;
class8.anIntArray156[1] = 54503;
class8.anIntArray156[2] = 54183;
class8.anIntArray156[3] = 11200;
class8.anIntArray160[0] = 9152;
class8.anIntArray160[1] = 9172;
class8.anIntArray160[2] = 9172;
class8.anIntArray160[3] = 9152;
class8.anInt174 = 59999;
class8.anInt181 = 2000;
class8.anInt190 = 500;
class8.anInt198 = 0;
class8.anInt204 = 14;
class8.anInt169 = -6;
class8.anInt194 = 1;
class8.anInt165 = 59999;
class8.anInt200 = 59999;
class8.anInt175 = -1;
class8.anInt197 = -1;
class8.anInt199 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “Bandos Cape”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “A very powerful Cape”.getBytes();
}

Plz walk me through the process.
